name: Talcura Technologies Inc.
overview: Talcura is an end-to-end recruitment management platform that allows organizations to effectively source, select and hire the best candidates with increased speed and effectiveness. It simplifies the recruiting processes, enhances Recruiters and Hiring Managers collaboration and communication, automates time-consuming tasks, improves the candidate’s experience, reduces wasted time and provides seamless end-to-end recruitment workflows – from candidate sourcing to hiring to on-boarding – all in one Single System – the Talcura Recruiting System. No more relying on several vendors for your recruitment and selection needs - manage all of your recruitment processes with a single interface and track key recruiting success measures with best in-class metrics to ensure alignment with your talent management strategy. Talcura’s Applicant Tracking and Recruiting System provides all of the capabilities necessary for optimizing your entire recruitment process and improving the efficiency and effectiveness of attracting and hiring the best talent - with simplicity and easy of use:
